DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study Inhaled AeroLEF Analgesia After ACL Knee Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: After elective ACL knee surgery , consent patient receive single dose AeroLEF moderate/severe acute pain . Patients stop dose achieve analgesia , complete maximum available dose , experience dose-limiting side effect .
